description: The evening sailing of the Ben-my-Chree and its overnight return are scrapped due to strong winds.
title: Gales halt ferry crossings between Isle of Man and Lancashire
title_page: Gales halt ferry crossings between Isle of Man and Lancashire - BBC News
maintext: The island's border is closed to non-residents, with only those granted special permission able to enter, however there are no restrictions on residents leaving or returning.
